item.title: MBA Master Thesis: Impact of Netiquette on Email Communication
item.description: This MBA Master Thesis investigated the impact of Netiquette in Emails on the recipients' level of understanding, job satisfaction, amount of uncertainty and perception of sendersâ€™ likability
